casebody.data:
Aaron YASHOUAFAR, Petitioner,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT OF THE STATE OF NEVADA, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Richard Scotti, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Raymund Carino on behalf of himself and as Representative of The Class Herein Defined, Real Party in Interest. No. 75439 Supreme Court of Nevada. MARCH 28, 2018

DENIED.
